detailed_events.description: LeBron James, wearing #23 for the Lakers, drives to the right baseline and hits a contested fadeaway jumper over a Charlotte Hornets defender.
Following the deflection, the Denver Nuggets turn the ball over. LeBron James recovers the loose ball to start a fast break.
After recovering the loose ball, LeBron James initiates a solo fast break, dribbling the length of the court.
LeBron James finishes the fast break with a powerful one-handed dunk.
With the shot clock expiring, LeBron James hits a difficult, contested, step-back 3-pointer from the right wing over a Hornets defender.
A Houston Rockets player (Kevin Porter Jr., #3) attempts a layup on a fast break.
LeBron James, wearing #6 for the Lakers, executes a signature chase-down block, pinning the Rockets' layup attempt against the backboard.
LeBron James, wearing a yellow Lakers jersey with number 23, performs a powerful one-handed dunk over Kevin Porter Jr. of the Houston Rockets.
A Lakers player passes the ball from the top of the key to a cutting LeBron James, leading directly to his dunk.
LeBron James, wearing a yellow Lakers jersey with number 23, receives a pass while cutting to the basket and finishes with a two-handed dunk against the Oklahoma City Thunder.
Tyler Herro of the Miami Heat leads a fast break after a turnover, dribbling the length of the court for a dunk attempt.
LeBron James performs a signature chase-down block, swatting Tyler Herro's dunk attempt from behind against the backboard.
Lakers guard Dennis Schröder (#17) pokes the ball loose from behind from Hornets guard Terry Rozier (#3) near midcourt, initiating a turnover.
Following the steal, Dennis Schröder leads a 2-on-1 fast break with LeBron James.
On the fast break, Dennis Schröder throws an alley-oop pass off the backboard to a trailing LeBron James.
LeBron James, wearing a yellow Lakers jersey with number 6, catches the alley-oop pass off the backboard and finishes with a powerful two-handed reverse dunk.
In a replay from a previous play, LeBron James (#6) completes a powerful two-handed dunk.
A Washington Wizards player (#24, Corey Kispert) attempts a 3-point shot from the left wing which misses.
Austin Reaves (#15) secures the defensive rebound after the missed 3-point shot.
Basketball event detected
Austin Reaves (#15) makes a quick outlet pass up the court to LeBron James (#23) who is cutting to the basket.
LeBron James (#23) drives to the basket and makes a contested layup while being fouled, resulting in an "and-one" opportunity.
Austin Reaves (#15) drives into the paint and delivers a bounce pass to a cutting LeBron James (#6).
LeBron James (#6) receives the pass and explodes for a powerful one-handed dunk over Kevin Porter Jr. (#3).
Malik Monk (#11) intercepts a pass intended for Terance Mann (#14) of the Clippers, initiating a fast break.
The Lakers start a 2-on-1 fast break after the steal, with Malik Monk leading the charge and LeBron James running alongside.
On the fast break, Malik Monk (#11) draws the defender and delivers a bounce pass to LeBron James (#23) for an easy score.
LeBron James (#23) finishes the fast break with an uncontested two-handed dunk.
LeBron James drives from the top of the key, splitting two defenders, and finishes with a right-handed layup in traffic.
LeBron James drives from the left wing into the lane and makes a contested, off-balance layup while drawing contact.
A Minnesota Timberwolves player, falling out of bounds while trying to save a bad pass, throws the ball back in play directly to LeBron James of the Lakers.
Immediately after catching the turnover, LeBron James pulls up from well beyond the arc and sinks a three-pointer.
With the shot clock running down, LeBron James attempts a fadeaway jump shot from the right elbow area. The video cuts before the result of the shot is visible.
[LeBron James (#23, Lakers) makes a difficult, contested running hook shot with his left hand while driving into the lane.]
[LeBron James (#23, Lakers) pulls up for and makes a very deep 3-point shot from the left wing over a defender.]
detailed_events.location: [Deep left wing, several feet behind the 3-point line]
